name: l4/5 - Group 2 - Bumble Launcher
description:
Very Basic Pre Alpha version of group 2's game. 

It has multiple game killing bugs. 

It is currently only single player, due to these bugs. 

The functionality of what each player needs to do is there. 

Use Space to Fire to simulate a mobile Tap

Use "L" To traverse a level once you have reached the top -> This is currently needed due to a bug that is being worked out.

A Game by: 

Daniel Beales James Macleanan Willoughby Axtell Kyle Bodin
